interface.name: IntBuffer2DConsumer
interface.javadoc:
Target of a streaming <tt>IntBuffer2D</tt> into which data is flushed upon buffer overflow.
wolfgang.hoschek@cern.ch
1.0, 09/24/99

Adds all specified (x,y) points to the receiver.
x the x-coordinates of the points to be added.
y the y-coordinates of the points to be added.
